bug.author: zzyunzhi
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Running the example for Async Python and Async Ray reports error TypeError: unhashable type: 'list' <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this - we should make sure our docs and examples run in Ci.
can you specify which example and the traceback?
